snippet.title: Capes - Official Rebound Character Trailer | The MIX x Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Meet Rebound, get a peek at the character's playstyle, and see her in action in this latest trailer for Capes, an upcoming turn-based superhero strategy game. In Capes, face down vile villains and criminal corporate henchmen. Do you have what it takes to free your city from the clutches of villainy!? Capes will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, Nintendo Switch, and PC in 2024.
